Text: Amo̩ma Lifai e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ge̩rsho̩n, Ko̩hat kpai Me̩rari.
Oñ amo̩ma Kohat e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Amram, Izhar kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Uzie̩l.
Amo̩ma Amram la che Aro̩n kpai Mose̩s kpai Miriam. Oñ amo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Nedab kpʼAbaihiu, E̩learn kpai Itamar.
E̩leaza bi Finehas; Fine-has bi Abaishua;
oñ Abaishua bi Bukai; Bukai la bi Uzai;
Uzai la bi Ze̩rahaiya; oñ Ze̩rahaiya bi Me̩rayo̩t;
Me̩rayo̩t bi Amaraya; oñ Amaraya bi Ahaitub;
Ahaitub la bi Ze̩do̩k; oñ Zedo̩k bi Ahimaaz;
Ahimaaz la bi Azaraya; oñ Azaraya bi Johanan;
Johanan la bi Azaraya, (owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da ugugu atama ef unyi ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ko̩ Je̩rusale̩m).
Azaraya la bi Amaraya; oñ Amaraya bi Ahaitub;
Ahaitub la bi Zedo̩k; oñ Zedo̩k bi Shalum;
Shalum la bi Hilkaya; oñ Hilkaya bi Azaraya;
Azaraya la bi Se̩raya; oñ Se̩raya bi Je̩hozadak.
Oñ Je̩hozadak le e̩gba ku Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za mu Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ño̩ le le̩.
Amo̩ma Lifai e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ge̩rsho̩m, Kohat kpai Me̩rari.
Oñ abu kʼodu amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ko̩ de̩: Libni kpai Shimeai.
Oñ amo̩ma Kohat e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Amram kpai Izhar kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Uzie̩l.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Mali kpai Mushi. Oñ abo-i chʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Lifai unyi unyi amata-ma.
E-Ge̩rsho̩m che Libni o̩ma-wñ, Jahat o̩ma-wñ, Zima o̩ma-wñ,
Joa o̩ma-wñ, Ido o̩ma-wñ, Ze̩ra o̩ma-wñ, Jeate̩rai o̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Kohat e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Aminadab o̩ma-wñ, Ko̩ra o̩ma-wñ, A sir o̩ma-wñ,
E̩lkana o̩ma-wñ, kpai Ibayasaf o̩ma-wñ, kpai Asir o̩ma-wñ,
Tahat o̩ma-wñ, Urie̩l o̩ma-wñ, Uzaya o̩ma-wñ, Sho̩l o̩ma-wñ;
oñ amo̩ma E̩lkana e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Amesai kpai Ahaimot.
I chʼe-E̩lkana, amo̩ma E̩lkana e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Zofai o̩ma-wñ, kpai Nehat o̩ma-wñ;
E̩liab o̩ma-wñ, Je̩roham o̩ma-wñ, E̩lkana o̩ma-wñ.
Oñ amo̩ma Samiue̩l e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che, o̩mo̩gba-wñ Fashnai kpai Abaija ekeji-wñ.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari che Mali, Libni o̩ma-wñ, Shimeai o̩ma-wñ, Uza o̩ma-wñ,
Shimea o̩ma-wñ, Hagaiya o̩ma-wñ, Asaya o̩ma-wñ.
Oñ abo-i chʼabo ku Defid kʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ eli jʼef o̩wo̩-ma ef unyi Jihofa, abu kʼakpati alo le̩ fʼuñmi ne.
Oñ e̩wñ-ma ku ma che chʼeli eko̩ o̩gba uña ugugu unyabo ujeju, gbogbo taku So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi Jihofa ko̩ Je̩rusale̩m; ma la dejutʼukpe̩ e-ma aro̩ne aro̩ne alu ku ma du ñwu ma.
Oñ abo ku ma dago jo̩ kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la de̩: amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abo Kohat che Heman akeli, o̩ma Joe̩l, o̩ma Samiue̩l,
o̩ma E̩lkana, o̩ma Je̩roham, o̩ma Ilaie̩l, o̩ma Toa,
o̩ma Zuf, o̩ma E̩lkana, o̩ma Me̩hat, o̩ma Amesai,
o̩ma E̩lkana, o̩ma Joe̩l, o̩ma Azaraya, o̩ma Ze̩fanaya,
o̩ma Tehat, o̩ma Asir, o̩ma Ibayasaf, o̩ma Ko̩ra,
o̩ma Izhar, o̩ma Kohat, o̩ma Lifai, o̩ma Israe̩l.
Kpai o̩maye-wñ Esaf, kʼi dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ, owñ chʼEsaf, o̩ma Be̩re̩kaya, o̩ma Shimea,
o̩ma Maike̩l o̩ma Baaseya, o̩ma Malkija,
o̩ma E̩tnai, o̩ma Zira, o̩ma Adaya,
o̩ma Etan, o̩ma Zima, o̩ma Shimeai,
o̩ma Jahat, o̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m, o̩ma Lifai.
Oñ amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼamo̩ma Me̩rari jʼo̩wo̩ awohi-ma; Itan o̩ma Kishai, o̩ma Abdai, o̩ma Maluk,
o̩ma Hashabaiya, o̩ma Amazaya, o̩ma Hilkaya,
o̩ma Amzai, o̩ma Beni, o̩ma Sheme̩r,
o̩ma Malai, o̩ma Mushai, o̩ma Me̩rari, o̩ma Lifai.
Oñ ma mʼamo̩maye ma, abo Lifai le̩, kojo̩ ñw e̩wñ eche ef uña ugugu e-unyi O̩jo̩.

Aro̩n kpʼamo̩ma-wñ muda gu e̩wñ jo dab otulale oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpʼoj ubo̩ otulale, tod uko̩lo̩ ef uña efo̩ e-efo̩ chaka, ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma todu Israe̩l, teju alu du ku Mose̩s, adu O̩jo̩ le̩, ñwate̩.
Abo-i la chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩: E̩leaza o̩ma-wñ, Finehas o̩ma-wñ, Abaishua o̩ma-wñ,
Bukai o̩ma-wñ, Uzai o̩ma-wñ, Ze̩ra-haiya o̩ma-wñ,
Me̩rayo̩t o̩ma-wñ, Amaraya o̩ma-wñ, Ahaitub o̩ma-wñ,
Zedo̩k o̩ma-wñ, Ahimaaz o̩ma-wñ.
Oñ ugbo-i chʼuña ugugu ugugu-ma alu ku ma ruru jo̩ alo̩me̩ e-ma: e-amo̩ma Aro̩n, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Kohat, (todu anya ejodudu ku ma ro̩ chʼe-ma)
ma du He̩bro̩n, oj ane̩ Juda, kpai ane̩ ije̩-wñ ki lʼo daka ñwu ma;
ma muda ko oko oko ewo le̩ kpʼadogbe̩-wñ ñwu Kele̩b, o̩ma Je̩fune.
Ma la mʼewo ewo ki chʼoko e̩ko̩ ko ñw amo̩ma Aro̩n, owñ che He̩bro̩n kpai Libna manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpai Jatir kpai E̩shte̩moa manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Haile̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, Dibe̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Ashan manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ oj ane̩ abʼo̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin Geba kpʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpai Ale̩me̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpʼAnato̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ. Ewo-ma du ugbo du ef o̩lo̩pu-ma chʼewo me̩gwe̩ta.
Ma la ko alu kʼanya je̩ kwef akwo̩ra unyi ef o̩lo̩pu (Ifraim kpai ef o̩lo̩pu Dan) kpai kwef ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa ñw amo̩ma Kohat ki bo̩, ewo me̩gwa.
Ma ko ewo me̩gwe̩ta kwef o̩lo̩pu Isakar, kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Naftali kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Manasa Beshan ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Anya je̩ ewo me̩gweji kwef o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n, kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Gad kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n, ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Amo̩ma Israe̩l la mʼewo ewo le̩ manyu ane̩ ije̩-wñ ko ñw abo Lifai.
Oñ ma mʼewo ewo ku ma dʼodu-wñ-i e-kʼanya je̩ kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Juda kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Sime̩o̩n kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Be̩njamin ko̩ ñwu ma.
Ma la mʼewo ewo oko e̩ko̩ She̩ke̩m, oj ane̩ uwo e-Ifraim manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Geze̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ ge̩
kpai Jokmeam manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n manyʼnae̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Aijalo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Gat-rimo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
ko ñw abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Kohat ku ma nʼewo ewo e-ma kwef o̩lo̩pu Ifraim.
Oñ kwef ukpe̩reji abo̩lo̩pu Manasa: Ene̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Baileam manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, achʼutodu abo akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Ko̩hat ki bo̩.
Oñ ma ko ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m kwef ane̩ abo akwo̩ra unyi ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa, Golan e-Beshan manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Ashto̩ro̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
oñ kwef ane̩ o̩lo̩pu Isakar; Kede̩sh manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpai Dabe̩ro̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Ramo̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Ene̩m manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ kwef o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r; Me̩shal manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Abdo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
kpai Huko̩k manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Re̩hob manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ kwef o̩lo̩pu Naftali, Kede̩sh oj ane̩ Galili manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Hamo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Kiriataim manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
Ma ko kwef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n: Rimono manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, Tabo̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari ki bo̩;
oñ ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu wñ odede Je̩riko ma ko kwef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n: Bize̩r ef aje̩tachi manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Jaza manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
kpai Kedemo̩t ge̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Me̩feal manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ kwef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Gad, Ramo̩t kʼi dʼoj ane̩ Gilead manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Mahanaim manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
kpai He̩shbo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Je̩za manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ ñwu ma.
